description:
Now stuck in the mysterious End Earth, Souma and Kureha meet a wolf man who explains what the sword, that Souma drew from Kureha, is. After fighting more demons, through several villages, with the wolfman. Souma and Kureha decide to  help seal all the demon gates that are letting the demons through, but is there more to it then just sealing the gates?
Source: crunchyroll
